title: Scarborough Ocean-View Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Immerse yourself in scenic coastal charm with a stay at the beachfront Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough. Perfectly positioned a stone's throw from Scarborough Beach, this laid-back oasis is also only about a 15-minute drive from Perth CBD. Inviting décor, fresh interiors, and azure ocean views, alongside modern amenities and thoughtful details, make for a relaxing sun-kissed retreat.

Stroll along picturesque Scarborough Beach en route to Brighton Beach, discover some of the city's finest cafés, or enjoy a local ale at the myriad of institutions that dot this beautiful area. When you're ready to relax and unwind, retreat to your room and unwind on your balcony overlooking the water, before a bite at the onsite Straits Café or a cocktail at the Lobby Bar. Take a dip in the outdoor pool or spa, or enjoy a friendly game on the tennis court.
offer_address: 148 The Esplanade, Scarborough, Western Australia 6019, Australia

title: Scarborough Ocean-View Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Immerse yourself in scenic coastal charm with a stay at Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough. Set only a 15-minute drive from Perth's CBD, this laid-back oasis is a mere stone's throw from picturesque Scarborough Beach. You'll be perfectly positioned to stroll The Esplanade en route to Brighton Beach and discover some of the city's finest cafes, or enjoy a local ale at the myriad of institutions that dot the neighbourhood streets. Inviting decor, fresh interiors and azure ocean views, alongside modern amenities and thoughtful details, make for a relaxing, sun-kissed retreat.

When you're ready to unwind, take a dip in the outdoor pool or spa, or enjoy a friendly game on the tennis court. Grab a bite at Straits Cafe or a cocktail at Cascade's Pool Bar before heading to your private balcony overlooking the water. At Scarborough's only beachfront property, you'll enjoy uninterrupted ocean sunsets every day of your stay.
offer_address: 148 The Esplanade, Scarborough, Western Australia 6019, Australia

title: Modern Apartment Escape Steps from Scarborough Beach near Perth
description: Discover the pristine beaches and seaside charm of Scarborough at your own pace, staying in a spacious, contemporary apartment at Seashells Scarborough, perfectly located just steps from one of the most sought-after beachfronts in Western Australia, which has had a A$100 million renovation. Spend days strolling along the coast, go cycling, or try your hand at surfing. Onsite, you can swim at the two outdoor pools, and if you want a night off cooking in your fully-equipped kitchen, treat yourself to waterside dining along the esplanade.

title: Perth Scarborough Escape Moments from Beach
description: Immerse yourself in coastal charm with a stay at the beachfront Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough, perfectly positioned a stone's throw from Scarborough Beach and a 15-minute drive from Perth's CBD. Stroll along the golden sands to Brighton Beach, discover some of the city's finest cafés, or sip a cocktail at one of the myriad restaurants that dot this beautiful area. When you're ready to relax, retreat to your room and unwind on your balcony overlooking the sparkling Indian Ocean, before grabbing a bite at the onsite Straits Café, or a sip at the Lobby Bar.
offer_address: 148 The Esplanade, Scarborough, Western Australia 6019, Australia
